description: Advanced flight control systems with a full-featured autopilot.
Tacview-compatible telemetry exporter for detailed mission debriefing.
Customizable cursor replacement and UI skinning utility.
Global FPS limiter for smoother performance and improved stability.
Core framework enabling custom WSO and AWACS voice packs.
Custom AWACS Sky Eye dialogue voice pack.
Jester AI backseater personality voice pack.
Classic backseater dialogue voice pack.
Solo Wing Pixy-inspired combat dialogue voice pack.
High-energy combat-focused WSO personality voice pack.
Russian-style combat radio chatter voice pack.
Expanded AWACS Galaxy dialogue voice pack.
AtomicFramework is a framework and utility library for developing mods for the game Nuclear Option.
Voice Chat for Nuclear Option.
Nuclear Option Voice idfk?!
A client-side mod that improves the Orbit camera experience in Nuclear Option.

it allows you to affect missile speeds increasing them to crazy fast speeds I plan to add other things like instant turning and eventually payload so bigger booms basically please let me know what you think.
This mod is similar to yappinator except this can affect things such as radar an ir locking sounds even the sounds generated by weapons ( a-10 brrrrrrt is being checked )

QoL mod which should benefit colourblind players, plus the ability to toggle player names on and off. (Player names appear above the aircraft triangle symbol in online matches, for better situational awareness of who is who.)

A BepInEx 5 mono mod for the game Nuclear Option. Adds a new Window to the loadout select menu that allows you to easily select and customize preset loadouts, saving the current Livery, Weapons selection, and fuel level.
This mod disables firing laser guided rockets at unlased targets. So for example chicane will only ever fire at a maximum of 4 targets, and only at those that it actually has line of sight to.

Nuclei is a dedicated server solution for Nuclear Option. It is designed to offer a flexible, easy-to-use, and easy-to-modify server solution. It is built on top of the BepInEx modding framework, and hence requires a BepInEx installation to run.

Nuclear Option Tactical Tools is an immersion and QoL focused gameplay mod. 
The mod aims to enhance cockpit immersion and reduce repetitive UI actions without automating core combat mechanics, with a heavy focus on ensuring non-mod users are not at a disadvantage and a vanilla feel for the new functionalities. Every component of the mod is togglable, and you can use your keyboard and HOTAS to interact with some of the new functionalities.
Makes every hardpoint independent.
Increases the Speed of the load for the FAMOUS qol mod.
My trying to learn adding new missiles currently (and in the foreseeable future) adds only the R9 as a mount to some aircraft.

ever wanted to set the gravity to the one of the moon or of the sun here you go. pros: its funny, cons: idk dont use if it has cons for you lol, only changes the physics gravity there are some things that have gravity inbuilt as a set magic number like flares
A bepinex mod to enhance the Nuclear Option mission editor experience.
A bepinex mod to enhance the Nuclear Option mission editor experience.
Comically oversized and overpowered dynamoâ„¢ The orbital strike thing (it doesn't work I don't think currently) hexhound, 20kt.
Any weapon, any pylon, no problems, if your airframe can handle it. Alternatively you can just edit the mission .json file to force any loadout to any aircraft, no mod required.
Is seaskimming too ambigious? then grab this mod to turn 0m/s into 0.00m/s (or feet if you're into that)
Cant be bothered to click each hardpoint and weapon each time? just hover over the button and scroll your wheel to change the weapon!
Annoyed that you have to reconfigure all your aircraft each time you restart the game or mission? Then this mod is for you! It makes sure the game always remembers the last loadout you configured.
Cant easily differentiate the enemies marked in red and the 'enemies' marked in blue? then grab this mod to make the enemies from red to pink, or any color you want!

Want to see exactly how fast or slow you are? then take this mod to see the exact splits, down to the milliseconds. This mod is fully reliant on mission messages, the first message sent is used as the start, each message after that is used as a checkpoint. this mod creates a .txt file next to the .dll, which contains your best times in each mission.
If you prefer the factions to always have their faction colours (purple BDF and orange PALA), even after you pick a side, then choose this!
a simple mod that also reads out the messages sent by the mission.
Changes RWR warning sound based on different situations.
Removed dirt from the game.

The FQ-106 Kestrel mod adds the Kestrel, a light combat drone with superb kinematics and Nuclear Option's first fully standalone custom aircraft. It features a custom model with unique flight performance and destruction, a custom MFD and damage display, 7 liveries, no G-loc, and self-destruction when the eject key is pressed.
A major overhaul mod for Nuclear Option. QoL adds custom weapons, units, features, plus hundreds of fixes and parity adjustments.
Dont want players in your server going on suicide runs? then grab this! this mod heavily encourages returning to base safely.
Simple HUD modification to improve gunplay.
Just a few more pylons on various aircraft
When firing at a target or multiple targets, each missile will first check if it's a valid target for itself.

The chicane is evil, now doubly so. Gives the Chicane's chin turret airburst ammo, allowing you to intercept missiles (the target leading seems to bug out half the time and the turret attempts to lead in the opposite direction lol, if that happens then retarget the missile). count your blessings i didnt teach the AI to use it.

A framework mod to 'easily' make new vehicles, weapons, ships, buildings, or even aircraft in the unity editor, and have them behave as any normal unit., The editor features a capability to use the proper in-game components and scriptableobjects, and a placeholder system if you want to use the game assets.
Makes the HUD and HMD appear while in orbit camera.
Press F6 while flying to enter freecam.
Simple standalone mod that makes the map easier to read for those with colorblindness. Mod by request.
Forces VLS boosters to spawn despite being launched from an aircraft. Affects AGM-98 and AShM-300; QOL 1.0.6 and above have this built-in.
Shows all copilots and crew while in first-person mode. Shows pilot as well during loadout selection; QOL 1.0.6 and above have this built-in.
Significantly increases the survivability of civilian map buildings so they no longer collapse from a single missile; QOL 1.0.6 and above have this built-in.
Disables jittering effect when being jammed, and keeps friendlies visible; QOL 1.1.0 and above have this built-in.
Forces all aircraft lights to stay on after raising gear if the time is between 1800 and 0600; QOL 1.0.6 and above have this built-in.
Adds a variety of new random verbs to killfeed messages. Includes rare entries. QOL 1.0.5 and above have this built-in.
Changes the HUD right margin numbers to show decimals when numbers are low, and adds a new dynamic RCS reading. QOL 1.1.0 and above have this built-in.
This mod tweaks the gun pip math a little to hopefully be more accurate, especially with lateral movement.
